discoveries.purpose: HTML deployment directory for 21-day China Feb 15 - Mar 7, 2026 trip
discoveries.naming_convention: kebab-case with ISO 8601 date format (YYYY-MM-DD) or trip identifier
organization_rules: Each subdirectory contains index.html for a dated version
Nested subdirectory for detailed planning data HTML
High update frequency with multiple versions per day
Most complex version structure due to 21-day multi-city itinerary

git_analysis.commit_pattern: Add travel plan: china-feb-15-mar-7-2026 (YYYY-MM-DD) or checkpoint: Auto-save

recommendations: All folders now have comprehensive README.md documentation
INDEX.md files generated for all 6 previously undocument folders
Automation level is 60% overall (60% automated, 40% manual/setup)
All existing READMEs were fresh (<7 days stale), no full regeneration needed
Root documentation (README.md) is fresh and user-written (preserved)
